description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Duck Cloth and to be delivered to  25 CDSF Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton and the Contracting Entity is the Department of the National Defense.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Notice: Aircraft Equipment**
------------------------------------------

**Title:**
Duck Cloth

**Reference Number:** cb-6978-35320910

**Publication Date:** 2023-07-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-03 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-08-03

**Procurement Details:**
------------------------

*   The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier for aircraft equipment.
*   The tender involves the delivery of Duck Cloth (GSIN: 8305, NSN: 8305-21-804-9964) to 25 CDSF Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton.
*   The quantities required are 250 units for each location.

**Item 1:**
----------

*   **Description:** Duck Cloth
*   **Quantity:** 250 units
*   **Location:** 25 CDSF Montreal
*   **Unit of Issue:** MR
*   **NCAGE:** 35907
*   **Part Number:** TEXT10-1-3

**Item 2:**
----------

*   **Description:** Duck Cloth
*   **Quantity:** 250 units
*   **Location:** 7 CFSD Edmonton
*   **Unit of Issue:** MR
*   **NCAGE:** 35907
*   **Part Number:** TEXT10-1-3

**Submission Requirements:**
---------------------------

*   Bidders can submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service.
*   If an equivalent or substitute product is proposed, the brand name, model, and/or Part Number, and NCAGE must be indicated.

**Document Submission:**
----------------------

*   Proposals must be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Important Note:**
------------------

*   Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the Department of National Defence recommends transmitting bids electronically to ensure timely processing.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

*   **Contact Name:** Dan Lebel
*   **Email:** dany.lebel2@gmail.com
*   **Phone:** (000) 000-0000
*   **Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, On, Canada K1A 0K2

**Attachments:**
----------------

*   **Bid Solicitation Document (English):** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/
